meanings.sent1: The cat took an unrushed stroll around the garden.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the unrushed pace of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The unrushed snail race was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: Her unrushed movements were like a slow dance.
meanings.sent5: The unrushed sunset painted the sky in gentle hues.

meanings.definition: Done or occurring at a relaxed pace
meanings.sent1: The unrushed morning allowed for a peaceful start.
meanings.sent2: He preferred the unrushed atmosphere of the small town.
meanings.sent3: The unrushed turtle race was oddly captivating.
meanings.sent4: The unrushed river flowed lazily through the valley.
meanings.sent5: Her unrushed speech was clear and deliberate.
